songs.title: Unity Song
songs.lyrics:
Together we stand, hand in hand,
United in purpose, across this land.
With hearts so true and spirits strong,
We sing this anthem all day long.

songs.title: Grace and Strength
songs.lyrics:
Grace flows like a river, strength like stone,
In fellowship we're never alone.
Through joy and sorrow, we remain,
Bound by honor, free from pain.
